About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Web developer who is passionate in team working & problem solving. Even though I've studied Education as my major, I've realized the power of IT and made my decision to learn how to code myself.

When i am not coding i like to draw & paint, chase cats or cook :tinaiseating

Netcentric, A Cognizant Digital Business

Junior Developer

Oct 2019 - Present

Netcentric is a digital service provider that transforms customer experiences for the world's top brands by unleashing the full potential of the Adobe Experience Cloud (AEM). I participated in a 7 week intensive training. Currently I am working on web development projects using HTML, CSS, SASS, JS, Python, AEM.

Quantgene

Freelance Web Developer

Aug 2019 - Sep 2019

Quantgene is a startup from CA working on early cancer detection using genomic data. I've participated in the frontend development using JavaScript & preactjs. HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, SPA

Talea.de

Full-Stack Engineer Intern

May 2019 - Jul 2019

Talea is a startup working on applications (web/mobile) to make the health care market efficient and sustainable. I’ve joined the team as full-stack intern and participated in both frontend and backend development. I’ve worked in a small team of 5-8 members in total. HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Python, React, Pyramid, Apollo, GraphQL
